Nolaskinsentials Hyaluronic Aloe Cleanser  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Nolaskinsentials

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis, Cocos Nucifera Milk, Melaleuca Oil, Cucumis Sativus, Anthemis Nobilis, Hyaluronic Acid, Camellia Sinensis, Xanthan Gum, Arame Algae Extract, Vitis Vinifera, Matricaria Chamomilla, C, Betaine, Lavender Extract, Citrus Sinensis, Camellia Sinensis, Mangifera Indica, Leuconostoc Radish Root Ferment
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
